channel.title: Dementhium 639 Problem's
channel.description:
Mmk, im using dementhium 639, and theres a dupe where if you drop a item, go to the lobby and log back in, your item that you dropped will still be in your inventory and will also appear on the ground, help please.
Another problem i encountered... Only certain items drop, like i can drop a dragon scmi, and it will show up on the ground; if i drop coins they disapear, like theres alot of items like that, any clue how to fix that?
Also, if you know any dupes on dementhium please let me know them so i can fix them, ThankYou very much.
If you dont know how to do anything here please tell me how to disable player droping items.
